post.title: Oh my circuits!
post.body: LOREM IPSUM TEXT: Say it in Russian! The alien mothership is in orbit here. If we can hit that bullseye, the rest of the dominoes will fall like a house of cards. Checkmate. Ah, the 'Breakfast Club' soundtrack! I can't wait til I'm old enough to feel ways about stuff! Leela's gonna kill me. Ok, we'll go deliver this crate like professionals, and then we'll go ride the bumper cars.
